changeSet.author: kurdyukov-kir
changeSet.comment: The table shows all possible types of YDB data.

createTable.remarks: The table shows all possible types of YDB data.

column.name: id
column.remarks: A signed integer. Acceptable values: from -2^31 to 2^31–1.

column.name: bool_column
column.remarks: Boolean value.

column.name: bigint_column
column.remarks: A signed integer. Acceptable values: from –2^63 to 2^63–1.

column.name: smallint_column
column.remarks: A signed integer. Acceptable values: from –2^15 to 2^15–1.

column.name: tinyint_column
column.remarks: A signed integer. Acceptable values: from -2^7 to 2^7–1.

column.name: float_column
column.remarks: A real number with variable precision, 4 bytes in size.

column.name: double_column
column.remarks: A real number with variable precision, 8 bytes in size.

column.name: decimal_column
column.remarks: A real number with the specified precision, up to 35 decimal digits

column.name: uint8_column
column.remarks: An unsigned integer. Acceptable values: from 0 to 2^8–1.

column.name: uint16_column
column.remarks: An unsigned integer. Acceptable values: from 0 to 2^16–1.

column.name: uint32_column
column.remarks: An unsigned integer. Acceptable values: from 0 to 2^32–1.

column.name: uint64_column
column.remarks: An unsigned integer. Acceptable values: from 0 to 2^64–1.

column.name: text_column
column.remarks: Text encoded in UTF-8.

column.name: binary_column
column.remarks: A string that can contain any binary data.

column.name: json_column
column.remarks: JSON represented as text.

column.name: jsondocument_column
column.remarks: JSON in an indexed binary representation.

column.name: date_column
column.remarks: Date, precision to the day.

column.name: datetime_column
column.remarks: Date/time, precision to the second.

column.name: timestamp_column
column.remarks: Date/time, precision to the microsecond.

column.name: interval_column
column.remarks: Time interval (signed), precision to microseconds
